sentences.sentence: Derivatives of these compounds include epirubicin and idarubicin.
sentences.translation: 这些化合物的衍生物包括表柔比星和伊达比星。

sentences.sentence: Polynitrocubanes are one of the most important derivatives of cubane.
sentences.translation: 多硝基立方烷是立方烷的重要衍生物之一。

sentences.sentence: Polymeric distribution of soluble trimethylsilylation (TMS) derivatives is separated.
sentences.translation: 分离可溶性三甲基硅烷化（TMS）的衍生物的聚合分布。
